title: Nvidia freeze
body:
got Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti ,Win10 ,new driver and  every game I got freeze so I have to restart comp . 
Any tips,advice,anything?

thnx

replies.body: I've been having the same issue. Saw something about the Xbox game bar needing to be turned off. Helped some people but didn't seem help mine.
^ This would be a good first step. Double check that the Game DVR Bar is turned off as this can cause quite a bit of FPS issues typically.
turned off and still in game freeze

I contact Nvidia support and till now i get solution, 5 games in a row didn't freeze.

**Open the NVIDIA control panel-------->3D settings------->Manage 3D settings-------->Program setting
------>Select the game's .exe file or add the .exe file of the game
 ------->power management mode. If it is set to "Adaptive" now change it to "Prefer maximum performance"

Open "NVIDIA Control Panel" > "3D Settings" > "Manage 3D Settings" > "Global Settings"
Please set to these below settings and click on "apply"

Power management mode – prefer maximum performance
•             Ambient Occlusion – Off
•             Triple buffering – off
•             Threaded optimization - ON
•             Vertical Sync – Off 


I hope other players can resolve problem with this settings .
after 20h of playing I can said its work
2nd step?  Rito any advice or thats it ?
after turned off everything in game dvr mode and video in game put on medium,still freeze

turned off game bar,game DVR ,record in background off,recorder audio off,game mode off. Means all possible in game mode i turn OFF.Let`s see next game freeze or not....cross finger ;)

**after turned OFF everything**: just finish game and i get  2 time freeze on 1 sec but i do not restart comp.So still freeze but in ranked game not playable ,imagine in TF freeze.....
